main event: A civilian observer reported sighting a bright glowing spherical object with a tail in Los Alamos, N.M. on December 24, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as glowing with a bright red and green tint., The sighting occurred at approximately 1328 hours for 2 to 3 seconds., The object moved from south southeast towards north northwest., The observer noted a falling arc before the object dropped from sight beyond the hills., The object was approximately the size of a very large motor and emitted a trail the same color.
witness description: Name of Observer is REDACTED, a protective force inspector.
